dcterms:description: THUMOS14 consists of 200 validation videos and 213 test videos for temporal action localization. It is used to evaluate the performance of action recognition models.
dcterms:title: THUMOS14

dcterms:creator: Fabian Caba Heilbron
Victor Escorcia
Bernard Ghanem
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: ActivityNet-1.3 contains 10,024 videos and 15,410 action instances for training, 4,926 videos and 7,654 action instances for validation, and 5044 videos for testing. It is used for human activity understanding.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet-1.3
